wordpressPage.title: Extreme Ironing
wordpressPage.content:
This is a great activity for making a walk more exciting. All you need is a small ironing board, a shirt and an iron (depending on the size of your group you may want a few).

Explain to your group about the sport ‘Extreme Ironing’…perhaps do some research in advance…there’s even a book.

Encourage them to try and find extreme places to iron throughout your walk and take lots of photos.

Note:Â Make sure young people are supervised and encourage leaders to risk assess how extreme is too extreme!
